title: Программы магистратуры и аспирантуры
content: Преподавание магистрам Founded in 1919, the graduate education in Nankai University can be traced back to 1928. So far, graduate education at Nankai University boasts a history of more than 80 years. As a comprehensive research university with equal emphasis on liberal arts and science as well as a wide range of disciplines, Nankai University has formed a unique graduate education model.Nankai University currently has 26 colleges (departments, institutes) and research centers with graduate enrollment qualifications, c
